DESCRIPTION: Set the verification settings for your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setcapital enable** ~ Enables the capital spam filter at 50%.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}setcapital disable** ~ Disables the capital spam filter on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}setcapital [# Amount]** ~ Sets the % of capitals that are allowed in a message. Must be between 40-100.
ALIASES: Setcapital does not have any aliases
DISABLED: You have successfully disabled the capital spam filter.
ALREADY_ENABLED: The capital spam filter is already enabled. If you are wanting to change it's sensitivity then type **help setcapital** to see how to change the amount.
ENABLED_DEFAULT: You have successfully enabled the capital spam filter at 50% max capitals allowed in a message.
INVALID_AMOUNT: You did not give a valid amount. The capital spam filter sensitivity must be between 40-100.
ENABLED: The capital spam filter has been enabled at {{amount}}% sensitivity.
